notPossible.text: It is not possible to check for updates for %$1. Please check manually for Updates for the script. The actual installed version is %$2. This message will appear again in four weeks.

possible.text:
There is an update for %$1 available.
At the moment there is version %$2 installed. The newest version is %$3.

noNewExists.text: There is no new version for %$1 available. The newest version %$2 is installed.

notifyLevel.description: Notify on new script versions up to this level:

importNotification.explanation: Put your JSON to import in the area below and click OK. The options will be imported then. Please ensure that no character is missing. Otherwise the import will not work.

exportNotification.explanation: Please copy the JSON below. You can import it on any computer to get the options there. Please ensure that no character is missing. Otherwise the import will not work.

importError.explanation: There was an error while importing the options. It seems that the JSON is broken. Please validate it (e.g. with JSONLint).

resetNotification.explanation: Are you sure to reset all script options to their default value?

general.successful: Your order has been carried out.
general.error: There was an error in your request.
